articles.title: Secretary Of Labor Eugene Scalia On Economy and USMCA Trade Deal
articles.description:
Secretary of Labor Eugene Scalia and Guy talk about the Trump Economy. Touting low unemployment and record job reports. Sec Scalia urged Congress to pass the USMCA trade deal to further the booming economy and stock market.

articles.description: He wasn't even shopping for a car.
